title: EXCEL
subtitle: Artistic gymnastics for gymnasts looking for more.

classes.detail: Junior class for levels 1 - 3. Fees may include Gymnastics NZ's recreational member fee of $10.17, and HCG's quarterly membership of $5
Levels 3 & 4. Fees may include Gymnastics NZ's recreational member fee of $10.17, and HCG's quarterly membership of $5
Junior class for levels 1 - 3. Fees may include Gymnastics NZ's recreational member fee of $10.17, and HCG's quarterly membership of $5
Levels 4+. Fees may include Gymnastics NZ's recreational member fee of $10.17, and HCG's quarterly membership of $5

body:
EXCEL is a 6-level programme created by Harbour City Gymnastics for recreational gymnasts.

We currently offer this programme for artistic gymnastics, which covers both women’s and men’s apparatus i.e. Vault, Bars, Beam, Floor, Pommel, Rings.

There is a high emphasis on teaching technique that is both aesthetically pleasing and that will develop later towards more difficult skills. Compared to our entry-level recreational classes (Ribbon & Badge), gymnasts will find that they are spending more class time working in small groups with a coach to learn new skills.

## Assessment

Gymnasts are judged to verify that they are performing their set skills to a certain level, before being able to move upwards into the next level. Testing happens throughout the year on specific testing days, and also at competitions (see below).

## Competitions

Gymnasts in EXCEL are offered the opportunity to compete in Gym-For-All competitions during the year. Routines are developed within the class for these competitions, and supplementary sessions are allocated to allow the gymnasts to prepare.
